author: sujonali1819
created_time: March 21, 2023, 05:07:45 PMLast edit: May 16, 2023, 03:42:31 PM by sujonali1819
content: We are excited to announce our latest promotion, the 24-hour deposit competition! This is your chance to show off your skills and compete against other players for a chance to win big. The rules are simple, make a deposit and wager as much as you can within 24 hours to claim the top prize.24h Deposit competition is starting now... Rewards: 1st 100 USD worth of BTC2nd 50 USD worth of BTC3rd 25 USD worth of BTCThe biggest deposit X wagering amount will be the winner. For example:You make a $100 Deposit and wager $400. (Worth $100 x $400 wagering amount =40,000points)Players who have the biggest points  will be the winners.General Rules No abuse, If we find out someone abusing the campaign, we have the right to exclude him/her from this campaign.Alternative accounts are not allowed.You can make several deposits during enrolling in this campaignIf you make a withdrawal then participation is over but your points still will be counted.Blackjack.fun General terms and conditions will be applicable Duration 24 hours after posting this campaign here.How we will Select the winners As soon as the deposit will come we will take a snapshot of the deposit amount and wagering amount. After ending the competition we will count every depositor's points and select the winners according to their points.Best of Luck
